home.title: Hello, I'm yoonju!
home.description: Currently based in France, I work as a freelance graphic designer while developing personal projects using modern web technologies such as Next.js, React, and TypeScript. By combining the creativity and visual sense gained from graphic design with web development, I strive to further enhance web services that deliver enjoyable and user-friendly experiences. Please feel free to explore my work and discover new possibilities along the way.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: I have built web applications using modern technologies such as React and Next.js. Rather than just focusing on functionality, I designed clear and user-friendly interfaces with responsive layouts that work smoothly across devices. I integrated multiple APIs and databases to deliver fast performance and a seamless user experience. By organizing code into reusable components, I made projects easier to maintain and expand. I also applied the latest web trends and accessibility standards so that anyone can use the applications comfortably. Through experience in planning, design, and development, I developed the ability to write clean code and collaborate effectively skills that can be applied directly in real-world projects.

design.title: Graphic Design
design.description: With over three years of experience, I have built expertise in brand identity, illustration, and marketing content. Beyond creating visuals, I engage from the planning stage to translate clients’ visions and goals into effective design. By harmonizing color, typography, and imagery, I strengthen brand value and deliver creative, sustainable solutions that stand out.

a15.title: ArgentBank
a15.description: I created a responsive dashboard and managed the application’s global state using React and Redux, integrating the back end through REST API calls. I defined the API endpoints with Swagger and used Node.js to handle the server.

a14.title: 724 events
a14.description: I reviewed and fixed bugs using Chrome DevTools and React Developer Tools. I resolved issues with JavaScript and React, implemented unit and functional tests, and used Yarn and Node.js for dependency management and test execution.

a13.title: Kasa
a13.description: I developed a responsive web application using React. I set up navigation between pages with React Router and built the interface using reusable React components.

a12.title: Architecture
a12.description: I created a dynamic webpage in JavaScript, including a login page and a modal for media uploads. I integrated a backend API and used Figma for layout and implementation. I also used Kanban for efficient task tracking and collaboration.

b20.title: Invitation
b20.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b20.description: Designed and produced web and print invitations for various Fusalp events, taking charge of incorporating the brand’s seasonal identity and visual elements into the overall design. Beyond simply creating event materials, I carefully considered color palettes, typography, and layout to effectively communicate the brand’s image and message, thereby reinforcing both brand consistency and the overall event experience.

b21.title: Lookbook
b21.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b21.description: Creation of lookbooks, contributing to the visual representation of the brand’s seasonal collections and helping to promote its launch.

b19.title: Magazine
b19.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b19.description: Creation of various fashion magazine pages that reflected the brand’s identity, designing visually appealing layouts to capture the readers’ attention.

b22.title: Communication
b22.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b22.description: Creation of visuals for communication press, designing compelling graphics and images to effectively convey the brand’s message to the media and enhance its public presence.

b23.title: Goodies
b23.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b23.description: Design of various promotional and gift products, including a card game design utilizing seasonal images and lookbooks, sticker designs for collaboration with the British ski team, chocolate box designs, water bottle designs, and more. All designs were crafted to align with the brand’s identity while maintaining a sophisticated and stylish aesthetic.

b24.title: Product
b24.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b24.description: Vectorizing products for the new season using Illustrator and continuously updating design modifications throughout the product development process. Additionally, I contributed to the creation of a catalog that lists all the products once the product lineup was finalized.

b25.title: Pattern
b25.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b25.description: Create pattern designs for fabrics that reflect the identity of each season.

b26.title: Technical file
b26.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b26.description: Create technical files for the trims used in the products, providing accurate information necessary for the product development and production processes.

b27.title: Pictogram
b27.description: Create pictograms for clothing labels, designing icons that clearly communicate washing and care instructions.

b28.title: Pictogram
b28.description: Create pictograms for Workbook, designing icons that clearly communicate washing and care instructions.

b29.title: Frames
b29.description: Carefully selected vintage images that aligned with the brand’s identity and carried out the design work of arranging photo frames on the wall.

b30.title: Advertising
b30.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b30.description: Creation of advertising visuals for the Paris metro, designing striking graphics to effectively promote the brand and capture the attention of commuters.

b31.title: Storefront
b31.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2021 to 2023.
b31.description: Development of window graphics for boutiques, incorporating design elements that align with the brand’s seasonal identity and visual language.

b32.title: Montage
b32.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2020 to 2023.
b32.description: I created my own unique visual montage by combining various images.

b33.title: Illustration
b33.cy: I worked on the same type of tasks from 2020 to 2023.
b33.description: I enjoy drawing illustrations, so I created works based on images that inspired me using Illustrator.

b34.title: Séoul
b34.description: I created an animation of the night view of Seoul.

b35.title: Electricité
b35.description: I created a logo for the establishment of an electrical company and also worked on vehicle sticker designs.

b36.title: Fruit
b36.description: Creation of a logo and business card for a food trading company.
